experiences.title: UI Developer
experiences.details: Working as UI Developer.Worked on different domains like Education, Payment Gateways, E-Commerce (Shopping Cart) Websites.

experiences.title: SEO Specialist cum Web Developer
experiences.details: Worked as Web Developer / SEO Analyst Worked on several small scale projects which include more 10-15 static websites.Did on-page optimization for multiple projects.

experiences.title: SEO Analyst cum Web Developer
experiences.details: Worked as Web Developer / SEO Analyst Worked on in-house project called bookahotel.in that allowed users to book flights and hotels anywhere in India.Did on-page optimization for better Google search result/ranking.

projects.name: AHA Life
projects.detail: AHA Life is an US based E-Commerce platform. Our role is to maintaine and take care of site along with exting feture updates and new feature integration as per requirment.

projects.name: Honoriety
projects.detail: Honoriety is an US based startup. As its an startup I get too many things to learn and Developing any product from scratch is always a next level experience. Technology side we have used Angular 2, HTML5, CSS3 for frontend development.

projects.name: Fidelis
projects.detail: Its an Online learning platform. Used HTML5, CSS3 for frontend and JAVA as a backend.

pocs.name: News APP
pocs.detail: As per name this is a fully responsive News App which displays the top ten news of the day for choosen media channel. I have used free news API to fetch relevant data & deployed it on firbase
